nodes.text: Soronna was a female Twi'lek who worked as a waitress at the Kragget restaurant, an all-hours cantina located on the planet Coruscant.
When Order 66 was implemented, Soronna helped Jedi Knight Etain Tur-Mukan by giving her a change of clothes.

Soronna first appeared in Star Wars canon in the Republic Commando novel Triple Zero, written by author Karen Traviss and published February 28, 2006. She went unnamed in Triple Zero, however, and did so again when she made subsequent appearances in Triple Zero's sequel, True Colors, published on October 30, 2007. The character was finally identified as Soronna in Traviss' fourth entry in the Republic Commando series, Order 66, published September 16, 2008.
